title: All nine bodies of skiers killed in California avalanche recovered
summary_full: Six additional skiers survived tragedy in Sierra Nevadas near Lake Tahoe, a popular winter sport destination‘They were mothers, wives, friends’: how a ski trip turned deadly in the California mountainsOfficials announced on Saturday that the bodies of all nine missing skiers who were killed in a devastating avalanche in California had been recovered, following days of search efforts.The avalanche happened in the Sierra Nevada mountains in northern California near Lake Tahoe, a popular skiing and winter sport destination. No more people are left missing after Tuesday’s deadly avalanche. Continue reading...
